# NSTextContentManager.EnumerationOptions

**Structure**

Values that control the order in which the framework enumerates text elements.

## Declaration

```swift
struct EnumerationOptions
```

## Creating text element provider enumeration options

- **init(rawValue:)**: Creates a new text element provider with the provided raw value.

## Accessing the enumeration setting

- **reverse**: Returns whether enumerations start from the end of the text element.

## Customizing and validating text elements

- **delegate**: The delegate for the content manager object.
- **NSTextContentManagerDelegate**: The optional methods that delegates of content manager objects implement for customizing or validating text elements.

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Equatable
- ExpressibleByArrayLiteral
- OptionSet
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
- SetAlgebra
